title: Google Assistant accepts "Hey Google, play SHOW on Chromecast" but nothing happens
content:
When I do a "Hey Google, play Dark on chromecast"

I get a "Sure, Dark from Netflix.  Playing on Living Room TV..."

However, nothing actually happens.

In an attempt to resolve this I have:
-restarted the Chromecast, Phone, and network devices.
-Turned off "Tap to Translate" in Google Translate.  (I had recently enabled this feature, but believe it is unrelated)
-unlinked Netflix, and performed a factory reset of the Chromecast.  And used the Pixel 4 to setup the Chromecast again.

This used to work flawlessly, but appears to have stopped working after one of the Phone Software updates.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4
